summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Enhanced KYC Module - Dashboard, Queue, Document Review, and Navigation all working correctly

minor_issues.issue: Document review action working but may need better response handling

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay not closing properly after reject action, blocking further interactions

passed_tests: KYC Dashboard Stats API - showing correct pending, in-review, approved counts
KYC Queue API - listing pending documents with proper structure
Document Review Dialog - opens correctly with user details
Navigation - KYC route working and properly highlighted
Tab Navigation - Dashboard, Queue, Rules & Levels tabs all functional
Level Configuration - Level 1 and Level 2 properly displayed
SLA Performance metrics - 45.5 min avg review time displayed
Level Distribution - showing user counts across all levels
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in Document Review dialog - modal doesn't close properly after reject action, preventing further UI interactions. Consider adding proper modal state management or force close after action completion.
